channel.title: New forums!/MMORPG
channel.description:
Forums: http://z10.invisionfree.com/Areithe/index.php? (I asked Mopar but he did not respond, so I assumed he did not object..)
Hello everyone, I just wanted to say that I have just opened the doors of the new forums, and home of a new MMORPG called Areithe. Areithe is still in the process of being made, and we hope to have a Beta V1.0 out soon (by the end of the month)! We are in need of Moderators/Beta Testers, so join now and apply!
FAQ:
Q.What is Areithe written in?
A. Areithe is written in Blitz3D and Blitz basic AS OF NOW. After we raise enough money, we plan to recode the whole thing in C++, and use a bunch of tools of higher quality to make a better game.
Q. Is Areithe a P2P game?
A. No, not at the moment, but in the future might cost maybe a dollar or two.
Q. While I am waiting for the beta game to be realeased what should I do?
A. Play Elddem, which can be found at www.soulgamerz.net and be active on our forums.
Q. What is the link to the forums?
A. http://z10.invisionfree.com/Areithe/index.php? (I asked Mopar but he did not respond, so I assumed he did not object..)

item.title: New forums!/MMORPG
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

Were you going to use the base of Elddem 2D? I am running of the engine Kilk used for 3D, and then after we raise about 2000 dollars, we are going to redo it all None of us want to code it in Blitz, but with money being a concern it is our only option…

Read full topic

item.title: New forums!/MMORPG
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

skip running it blitzed based i was considering using the same base as elldem and evan looking into blitz3d but theirs sooo many limitations when using someone elses base, for instance its not your code so you dont know how the original coder thinks thus you have to waste valuble time tryring to figure out what he was thinking when writing a peice

Read full topic

item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

Yep, I am glad you are excited :)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 04, 2006, 12:35:24 AM[/size][hr]C’mon people register

item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

Forums: http://z10.invisionfree.com/Areithe/index.php?
(I asked Mopar but he did not respond, so I assumed he did not object…)

Hello everyone, I just wanted to say that I have just opened the doors of the new forums, and home of a new MMORPG called Areithe. Areithe is still in the process of being made, and we hope to have a Beta V1.0 out soon (by the end of the month)! We are in need of Moderators/Beta Testers, so join now and apply!

FAQ:

Q.What is Areithe written in?

A. Areithe is written in Blitz3D and Blitz basic AS OF NOW. After we raise enough money, we plan to recode the whole thing in C++, and use a bunch of tools of higher quality to make a better game.

Q. Is Areithe a P2P game?

A. No, not at the moment, but in the future might cost maybe a dollar or two.

Q. While I am waiting for the beta game to be realeased what should I do?

A. Play Elddem, which can be found at www.soulgamerz.net and be active on our forums.

Q. What is the link to the forums?
